thread.section_title: LuxHair Wigs Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LuxHair Wigs | www.luxhair.com
thread.title: Sharon Nation
thread.title_full: LuxHair Wigs reviewed by Sharon Nation

author: Sharon Nation
title: Sharon Nation
text: I received my wig today in the mail 02/10/2017. I had hope it would come before tomorrow because I have a lunch appointment with a friend and my own hair is a mess. My own hair needs cutting and I have some gray. I am not a wig person, but I must say I tried on this wig and I look good and it made me feel sexy. I live in an apartment complex and I went to let the ladies in the office to see me they told me it looks good on me and I look younger. I am 57 years old even with my own hair as long as it is short I am told I look younger. Thank you Sherri I am proud to wear your hairline.
